name: [LKM] BOT
description: [LKM] BOT is the perfect bot to protect your server and have a moderation system ! It has powerfull latest features which can manage discord server.
feature1: Music, It can play different kind of music from different platforms like spotify, apple, etc.
feature2: Moderation, It has many moderation command with latest discord features like timeout.
feature3: Game, It contain many games commands and an economy system with shop and inventory.
feature4: Ticket, It is very easy to press the ticket and to close it. It have buttons to make it  more easy to use.
